title: Appeal To ban

replies.body: This is more of an asking for an explanation for how I got perma banned for 1 game. I know that more than likely this account is gone but I just want some justification to why you feel like I can be perma'd after 1 game.

I can answer that. You have had 4 punishments in less than 2 months. Punishments start off light to remind people their behavior is unacceptable by community standards. You did not change your behavior after numerous punishments, which serve as warnings. In your last punishment, you were told that further similar behavior would result in a perma-ban. You continued this behavior so you were issues a perma-ban.

The vast majority of players never receive a single punishment. Beyond that, the vast majority who receive a single punishment never receive another. Achieving the number of punishments you did in such a short period of time, along with the recent game you played where you showed no willingness to change your behavior, was enough to be certain your account should be perma-banned.

I am more than sure that I never received any warnings. I would remember them, honestly this just shows how much you guys really care about your more veteran players (I began around when Aatrox came out, so like S3'ish). I really see that riot likes to give people a chance to reform accounts back to a non toxic state, but you know, who listens to the community/toxic player? I'm relatively disappointed with this response from a Riot employee, this is why you guys have such a horrid community. Have you even explored the depths that are low silver/bronze elo? Honestly, i'm fine with how this turned out, I understand the punishment and all. Just comes to show that Riot Never forgives/Forgets.

You do know he's literally looking that up on their databases, right? Like, he's not just making it up.

And Riot does forgive/forget. It's why, if after receiving a punishment, you keep your nose clean for a while, your punishment level drops. Forgiveness is given to those that show remorse. You didn't and continued to do the things that got you in trouble in the first place. Stop pretending to be a victim of a system that doesn't care, even though you were given multiple chances to reform your behavior.
Quick question, are all perms bans manually reviewed? Or is it automatic like the other ones?

one question. Do you guys even care about bronze-gold when it comes to intentional feeders? Cause honestly, you guys are failing on your jobs when it comes to intentional feeders in ranked games. I guarantee if you guys started to actually do your jobs when it comes to intentional feeders, toxicity levels will actually drop because people can actually start enjoying the game again knowing that if they lost, it was cause of skill difference and not because a veigar mid goes 1-18-1 because he's intentionally feeding. 

Also, Get rid of dynamic queue already! it's failing

Unless you did or said something really horrid such as racist or sexist comments, death threats, or cheating then you would not be banned after one game.

It is important to note that Permenant Suspensions are often not a reflection of how serious the players violation was. There is a tiered punishment system in place to track player behaviour patterns and escalate punishments as the negative behaviour continues. Most players who receive and automatic Perma Ban either cheated or were extremely toxic in chat including racism, sexism, or death threats. 

However if that is not the case then it is more likely that you have been slowly progressing up the punishment ladder, receiving chat restrictions and minor suspensions. If that is infact true then the the chat log your provided is one of many instances where you were toxic and were accurately reported in your matches. It would seem to me that you used up your first three strikes and did not change your behaviour. Therefore the final strike is permanent as the system has seen nothing to suggest your behaviour was improving.

Please note that the chat log you received is just a sample provided as an example of your behaviour. You can submit a ticket to player support for more information and chat log examples.
Without chat logs, it will be difficult to tell why this game got you banned. As Sarutobi said, real bad behavior can cause you to skip punishment tiers.

The system takes in account the frequency you were toxic. 

So when you are punished with your 10, 25 game Chat restrict, 14-day ban that are close to each other, Riot flags you as "extremely toxic" and any little small thing can get you permaed.

Of course the level of toxicity matters, and sometimes they can only send you one game in the email.
